Universal Containers uses a simple Order Management app. On the Order Lines, the order line total is calculated by multiplying the item price with the quantity ordered. There is a Master-Detail relationship between the Order and the Order Lines object.
What is the best practice to get the sum of all order line totals on the order header?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
I would go with B and C

comments.content: sorry,I would go with B and C

discussion.content:
B. Add an Order_Shipment_Group__c custom object and create master-detail relationships to both Order__c and Order_Line__c.

This approach allows you to associate multiple Order_Line__c records with different shipping locations to a single Order__c record through the Order_Shipment_Group__c object. It provides the flexibility needed to manage split shipments for orders.
